<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81922</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81922</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3395</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Jack Frost and the Sneaky Sun</string>
            <string language="es">Jack congelado y el furtivo sol</string>
            <string language="ga">Seáinín Seaca agus an Ghrian Sleamhan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frost und die Sneaky Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gel de Jack et le soleil sneaky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geada de jack e o sol sneaky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gelo di jack ed il sole sneaky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ιαθκ Frost και ο sneaky ήλιος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A warm-up game which can be used with older classes. Useful for developing tactical awareness and game analysis.</string>
            <string language="es">Un juego de calentamiento que puede utilizarse con clases de niños mayores Útil para desarrollar las habilidades estratégicas y el análisis de juegos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cluiche téimh suas ar féidir a dhéanamh le ranganna níos sinsearaigh. Úsáideach chun feasacht oirbheartaíoch agus anailís cluiche a fhorbairt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Vorwärmung Spiel, das mit älteren Kategorien
benutzt werden kann. Nützlich für das Entwickeln des 
taktischen Bewußtseins und der Spielanalyse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu de préchauffage qui peut être utilisé 
avec des classes plus anciennes. Utile pour développer la 
conscience et l'analyse tactiques de jeu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo do warm-up que possa ser usado com classes
mais velhas. Útil para desenvolver a consciência e a análise 
táticas do jogo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco di preriscaldamento che può essere usato
con i più vecchi codici categoria. Utile per sviluppare 
consapevolezza ed analisi tattiche del gioco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι προθέρμανσης που μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί με τις παλαιότερες κλάσεις. Χρήσιμος για την 
τακτική ανάλυση συνειδητοποίησης και παιχνιδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
